law.text: To the extent necessary to conform to federal law, 42 U.S.C. sec. 666(a)(5)(l), except to the extent that it is required under Section 7 of the Constitution of Kentucky, no party shall be entitled to a trial by a jury in a paternity action.
law.history: Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 255, sec. 29, effective July 15, 1998. -- Created 1964 Ky. Acts ch. 37, sec. 6.
